actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title I of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to expand access to high risk pools.

summary.text: Amends the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to expand eligibility for the high risk health insurance pool program to include individuals who have been covered under a state health benefits risk pool during the six-month period prior to the date on which such individual is applying for coverage through the high risk pool.

titles.title: To amend title I of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to expand access to high risk pools.
